title: 4: OUR FOURSOME FT. FABBY
description:
From fresh jail stories to foursomes to exposing parts of Vegas many wish stayed there, Sofia heads to Las Vegas to join her BFF guest this week to share their super sloot secrets — how to ACTUALLY win big in Vegas WITHOUT spending a dime and some real insight and advice from their 28 years of friendship from diapers to today.

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
